tool.name: SAGA.imagery_tools.3
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayBLUE False isArrayGREEN False isArrayRED False isArrayNIR False isArrayMIR1 False isArrayMIR2 False output_data_BRIGHTNESS $output_data_BRIGHTNESS output_data_GREENNESS $output_data_GREENNESS output_data_WETNESS $output_data_WETNESS name SAGA.imagery_tools.3 BLUE $BLUE GREEN $GREEN RED $RED NIR $NIR MIR1 $MIR1 MIR2 $MIR2 prefer $prefer response $response outputType_BRIGHTNESS $OutputSection_BRIGHTNESS.outputType_BRIGHTNESS transmissionMode_BRIGHTNESS $OutputSection_BRIGHTNESS.transmissionMode_BRIGHTNESS outputType_GREENNESS $OutputSection_GREENNESS.outputType_GREENNESS transmissionMode_GREENNESS $OutputSection_GREENNESS.transmissionMode_GREENNESS outputType_WETNESS $OutputSection_WETNESS.outputType_WETNESS transmissionMode_WETNESS $OutputSection_WETNESS.transmissionMode_WETNESS
